item.description: Update #SolanoFire - Knockdown Brush Fire; INC#0545; 10:25AM; 1231 North Broadway; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DRAZ2J; #ElysianPark; Though *Address Corrected* From Solano Avenue to Broadway, this wildfire will still be known as the "Solano Fire". The first arriving 50 LAFD ground-based firefighters took just 24 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish what airborne firefighters have determined to be one-quarter (0.25) acre of medium brush. Though some structures, including an apartment building were in the path of advancing flames, proper vegetation clearance gave firefighters a defensive advantage and prevented the buildings from being directly threatened by flames. No injury. No evacuation. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO1 BC1 BC11 BC2 CM22 E1 E16 E201 E203 E209 E220 E29 E290 E33 E38 E44 E56 E6 E9 EM1 H1 H2 H5 HA1 HA2 HA5 RA1 T1 T20 T3 T9 T90 + LACoFD Air Ops; CH5; 13; Brian Humphrey

Update #SolanoFire Brush Fire; INC#0545; 10:15AM; 564 W Solano Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DVwm7J; #ElysianPark; This active wildfire, known as the "Solano Fire" has now consumed one (1) acre of medium brush. Fire spread is topography driven with light wind. Some structures, including an apartment building to advancing flames, but thanks to vegetation clearance, are not immediately threatened. No injury. No evacuation.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO1 BC1 BC11 BC2 CM22 E1 E16 E201 E203 E209 E220 E29 E290 E33 E38 E44 E56 E6 E9 EM1 H1 H2 H5 HA1 HA2 HA5 RA1 T1 T20 T3 T9 T90; CH5; 13; Brian Humphrey

Five Patients Total (2 Critical / 3 Minor Injuries). No further details. Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1050; 03:43PM; 1673 E 111th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/37vhLUt; #Watts; 43 Firefighters took just 22 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish a well involved one-story detached garage to the rear of the property. Firefighter efforts prevented fire spread to nearby structures. Despite a roof collapse, no injuries have been reported. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 65; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 E221 E233 E264 E33 E64 E65 EM13 RA65 RA865 SQ21 T21 T33 T64 + LACoFD E41 SQ41; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Pedestrian Struck; INC#0316; 07:38AM; 1629 E 24th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KiFuWn; #CentralAlameda; PRELIM: One pedestrian (unknown age / gender / affiliation / circumstances) deceased and remains at scene after apparently being struck by (undetermined direction) Metro A (Blue) Line light rail train. No other physical injuries reported. Train Riders: Follow @MetroLAAlerts https://twitter.com/MetroLAAlerts for updated service information. Media Inquiries: LAPD Central Traffic Division (Incident #924) Coroner and Metro Los Angeles.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC13 E14 E21 E221 EM1 HR3 RA21 SQ21 T21; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0190; 04:51AM; 11005 W Hesby St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xidwpQ; North Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN: 36 firefighters extinguished the fire in 28 minutes with no injuries reported. The bulk of the fire was in a vacant, one story commercial building which had a small, single family dwelling attached to the rear. The fire extended (to varying degrees, extent of damage unknown at this time) to the attached and adjacent exposed building. Primary and secondary searches were clear. Cause of fire and $ loss are TBD. No further details. ; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E260 E278 E289 E60 E76 E86 RA60 RA860 T60 T78 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart
